context: Hi!! Can you recommend me some movies? I like movies like White Chicks (2004)
well I can recommend you Deadpool (2016)
I saw that movie do you have another one?
I'm not very fond of those movies but I recommend this action The Fate of the Furious (2017)
I don't know what is that movie You mean Fast & Furious (2009)??
resp: if I understand you, but I can recommend this to Wonder Woman (2009) yes

context.content: Hi!! Can you recommend me some movies? I like movies like White Chicks (2004)
well I can recommend you Deadpool (2016)
I saw that movie do you have another one?
I'm not very fond of those movies but I recommend this action The Fate of the Furious (2017)
I don't know what is that movie You mean Fast & Furious (2009)??

No, I meant The Fate of the Furious, which is the eighth installment in the Fast & Furious franchise. It has a lot of action and fun moments. Would you like more recommendations in a similar comedy style as White Chicks?

I appreciate your suggestions, but I'm really looking for something that features a strong female lead and a compelling origin story. There's a fantastic animated film that showcases a powerful heroine, her journey, and her battles against formidable foes. It beautifully blends action and character development, making it a great watch for anyone who enjoys stories of empowerment and heroism.

Thank you for sharing your preferences! Based on your interest in strong female leads and compelling origin stories, here are some recommendations:

1. Moana (2016)
2. Mulan (2020)
3. Wonder Woman (2017)
4. Brave (2012)
5. The Hunger Games (2012)
6. Captain Marvel (2019)
7. Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018)
8. Raya and the Last Dragon (2021)
9. The Incredibles (2004)
10. Frozen II (2019)
